properties.Name: RecipeRelationshipType
properties.Description:
The nature of the relationship between the related recipes.

Ex:
- Replacement recipe
- Comparable recipe
- Master-Site Recipe
- General-Site recipe
- Updated recipe

Columns.Name: RecipeRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a recipe relationship type.

Columns.Name: RecipeRelationshipTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a recipe relationship type.

Columns.Name: RecipeRelationshipTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a recipe relationship type.
